title: Life After
lyrics:
Where the sun always sits slow
Tide always hide
Where the star stay with moon
Always in the sky
Down the road where you live
With all of the people you've ever lost

And they dance and sing, and smile

When you arrived

And they say



I’ve been waiting for you

Since the day you were born

Thousands of years ago

Hope it makes you feel like

I've been waiting for you

Since the day you were born

Thousands of years ago

Hope it makes you feel like home

Hope it makes you feel like home

Hope it makes you feel like



It always feels warm all the way down

There's no days, no weeks, no months

No years to go wrong

No such thing as a child of woman and man

Just the voices of souls that we’ve lost will meet you again

And they say



I've been waiting for you

Since the day you were born

Thousands of years ago

Hope it makes you feel like

I've been waiting for you

Since the day you were born

Thousands of years ago

Hope it makes you feel like home

Hope it makes you feel like home

Hope it makes you feel like home
